name: ChatAid
description:
When you found a wacky program on your PC called “ChatAid”, you ended up in a chatroom. Someone needs your help.

Features
* A very short story written in Ren’py, in Two Parts, with 4 endings in total (2 per part).
* You can choose your name, nickname and gender.
* Steam Achievements.
* 2,486 words.
